attributes.action: Remind those on job seekers allowance that they need to SEEK a job......
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The JSA is a payment to allow people to actively seek employment.  It should be a legal obligation to seek work, else it be realistically cut.  Too many sit & wait for payments to arrive.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence - 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=job+seekers+
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
